projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform using Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.
details: Developed responsive and user-friendly UI with Next.js
Implemented server-side rendering for better SEO
Built REST APIs using Node.js and Express
Integrated MongoDB for storing product, user, and order data
Added payment gateway integration for seamless checkout

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for devices of all sizes.

features.title: Secure Payment
features.description: Integrated secure payment gateways for seamless checkout.

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.description: Improved search engine ranking with server-side rendering.

projects.title: AI Chatbot
projects.description: Created an AI-powered chatbot using Python and natural language processing techniques.
details: Built the chatbot backend using Python
Utilized natural language processing (NLP) techniques with libraries like spaCy
Integrated chatbot with messaging platforms such as Telegram
Added intent recognition and dynamic responses
Implemented machine learning for improved conversation accuracy

features.title: AI-Powered
features.description: Dynamic responses based on NLP and ML techniques.

features.title: Multi-Platform
features.description: Seamlessly integrated with various messaging platforms.

features.title: Continuous Learning
features.description: Improved performance over time with machine learning.

projects.title: YouTube Growth
projects.description: Grew my YouTube channels to over 10,000 subscribers combined.
details: Created engaging tech tutorials for 'NJ as Coder'
Produced funny and entertaining content for 'Natkhat Jay'
Optimized videos for YouTube search with proper SEO strategies
Consistently uploaded videos to build audience engagement
Interacted with followers to create a strong community

features.title: Audience Growth
features.description: Built a strong community of followers.

features.title: Monetization
features.description: Generated revenue through ads and sponsorships.

projects.title: FastAPI Application with PostgreSQL
projects.description: Create a Python-based web development project using FastAPI as the server, PostgreSQL as the database, and deployed on Google Cloud.
details: Build RESTful API with FastAPI
Implement data validation using Pydantic
Set up PostgreSQL database for data persistence
Deploy the application on Google Cloud Platform
Implement authentication and authorization
Create comprehensive API documentation using Swagger UI

features.title: High Performance
features.description: FastAPI offers very high performance, on par with NodeJS and Go.

features.title: Easy to Use
features.description: Designed to be easy to use and learn. Less time reading docs.

features.title: Fast to Code
features.description: Increase the speed to develop features by about 200% to 300%.
